EmailTemplate.name: Loss or Damaged
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case No.: {!Case.CaseNumber} Dear Customer,
Please note that we are unable to assist with claims relating to the loss or damage of freight.
If you hold Transit Warranty cover, please visit https://forms.startrack.com.au/tools/make-transit-warranty-claim/ to make a claim.
If you require further assistance or wish to understand more about our Transit Warranty service offering, please speak with your Account Manager.
NOTE: Please be advised you are now able to lodge your credit claim online by completing our credit claim form via https://forms.startrack.com.au/tools/credit-claim.
Regards,
Customer Resolution Team StarTrack
